theShooter:FireEverything.NAME: Fire Everything!
theShooter:FireEverything.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy [R] times for each card in hand then discard your whole hand.

theShooter:Velocity.NAME: Velocity
theShooter:Velocity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Evasion after playing a card.
theShooter:Velocity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Evasion after playing a card.

theShooter:ThreePointShot.NAME: Three Point Shot
theShooter:ThreePointShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !M! gold. NL Masterful: Deal triple damage.

theShooter:MeltArmor.NAME: Melt Armor
theShooter:MeltArmor.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, !M! times. NL Exhaust
theShooter:MeltArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, !M! times. NL Exhaust

theShooter:BarrierForm.NAME: Barrier Form
theShooter:BarrierForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Gain 1 Buffer.
theShooter:BarrierForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Gain 1 Buffer and !PA! Plated Armor.

theShooter:FlameThrower.NAME: Flame Thrower
theShooter:FlameThrower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies !M! times, then gain !M! Fire Breathing this turn.
theShooter:FlameThrower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies !M! times, then gain !M! Fire Breathing this turn.

theShooter:RushedRepairs.NAME: Rushed Repairs
theShooter:RushedRepairs.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP 4 times. NL Penalty. NL Exhaust.

theShooter:Nullify.NAME: Nullify
theShooter:Nullify.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! block and !M! Intangible. NL Penalty. NL Exhaust.

theShooter:TrickShot.NAME: Trick Shot
theShooter:TrickShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !M! gold. NL Penalty. NL Exhaust.

theShooter:IceMissiles.NAME: Ice Missiles
theShooter:IceMissiles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Masterful: Repeat !M! times.
theShooter:IceMissiles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Masterful: Repeat !M! times.

theShooter:LuxuryShield.NAME: Luxury Shield
theShooter:LuxuryShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Wealthy: Change !M! gold into twice as much block.

theShooter:MultiShot.NAME: Multi-Shot
theShooter:MultiShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Healthy: Repeat. NL Wealthy: Repeat. NL Masterful: Repeat.

theShooter:HullRepairs.NAME: Hull Repairs
theShooter:HullRepairs.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Wealthy: Spend !M! gold to gain !RV! Max HP instead. NL Exhaust.

theShooter:xXM4d5k1llZXx.NAME: xX_M4d_5k1llZ_Xx
theShooter:xXM4d5k1llZXx.DESCRIPTION: Masterful: Gain !GD! gold. NL Wealthy: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Healthy: Gain !M! Strength. NL Grave. Exhaust

theShooter:StorePower.NAME: Store Power
theShooter:StorePower.DESCRIPTION: Grave Ethereal. NL Double your energy on the first turn of next combat. NL Your [R] becomes 0. NL Exhaust.

theShooter:DareDevil.NAME: Dare-Devil
theShooter:DareDevil.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, take !M! damage and draw !M! card.
theShooter:DareDevil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you play a card, take !M! damage and draw !M! card.

theShooter:ReflexShot.NAME: Reflex Shot
theShooter:ReflexShot.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, fire !M! shot at a random enemy that deals 3 damage. NL Treated as attack damage.
theShooter:ReflexShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When attacked, fire !M! shots at random enemies that each deal 3 damage. NL Treated as attack damage.

theShooter:WarpDrive.NAME: Warp Drive
theShooter:WarpDrive.DESCRIPTION: Grave. Ethereal. NL Flee from a Non-Boss combat, lose all your energy on the first turn of next combat.

theShooter:PredictiveShield.NAME: Predictive Shield
theShooter:PredictiveShield.DESCRIPTION: Grave. Ethereal. NL Gain !B! block on the second turn of next combat. NL Exhaust.
theShooter:PredictiveShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Grave. Ethereal. NL Gain !B! block on the second turn of next combat. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

theShooter:Grazed.NAME: Grazed
theShooter:Grazed.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy attack fails to break your block, gain !M! block.
theShooter:Grazed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If an enemy attack fails to break your block, gain !M! block.

theShooter:FlashShield.NAME: Flash Shield
theShooter:FlashShield.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! + 1 block. NL Masterful: Each time an enemy breaks your block this turn, gain !M! block.

theShooter:Untouchable.NAME: Untouchable
theShooter:Untouchable.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Gain !M! Evasion. NL Exhaust.

theShooter:AntiMatterBeam.NAME: Anti-Matter Beam
theShooter:AntiMatterBeam.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Give a target enemy !M! Fading. NL Exhaust.

theShooter:WardingShot.NAME: Warding Shot
theShooter:WardingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal a random amount of damage from 1 to !D! And gain block equal to !B! + the remainder.

theShooter:SkillRush.NAME: Skill Rush
theShooter:SkillRush.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, play and exhaust any skills drawn and draw a replacement for them.

theShooter:StatusRush.NAME: Status Rush
theShooter:StatusRush.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, exhaust any statuses drawn and draw a replacement for them.

theShooter:HeavyHull.NAME: Heavy Hull
theShooter:HeavyHull.DESCRIPTION: Startup: Exhaust. NL Healthy: Gain !M! Temporary HP instead. NL Unplayable. NL Gain !B! block when drawn.

theShooter:GoldHull.NAME: Gold Hull
theShooter:GoldHull.DESCRIPTION: Startup: Exhaust. NL Wealthy: Change !M! gold into Temporary HP instead. NL Unplayable. NL Gain !RV! Gold when drawn.

theShooter:OpticHull.NAME: Optic Hull
theShooter:OpticHull.DESCRIPTION: Startup: Gain !THP! Temporary HP. NL Unplayable. NL Gain !M! Evasion when drawn.

theShooter:AutoRepairs.NAME: Auto-Repairs
theShooter:AutoRepairs.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain !M! Temporary HP when drawn.

theShooter:WeaponCharge.NAME: Weapon Charge
theShooter:WeaponCharge.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain !M! Strength when drawn.

theShooter:ShieldCharge.NAME: Shield Charge
theShooter:ShieldCharge.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain !M! Dexterity when drawn.

theShooter:AttackRush.NAME: Attack Rush
theShooter:AttackRush.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, play and exhaust any attacks drawn and draw a replacement for them. NL Exhaust.

theShooter:CURSES.NAME: CURSES!
theShooter:CURSES.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random curses to your draw pile. NL When you draw an attack or skill, play it on a random target and exhaust it. NL Discard any powers you draw. NL Exhaust any statuses you draw. NL Draw replacements for all of the above. NL When you draw a curse deal 3 damage to all enemies.
